text: Air Papan The village of Air Papan is a seaside area with a 3 km long beach set in between the hills in Mersing District, Johor, Malaysia. Other than a few properties and a mosque in the village beach-side area the remainder are dotted around the area. Every 1 May the "Pesta Air Papan" - Air Papan Festival- is celebrated featuring cultural shows, games, food etc. ==References== Category:Mersing District Category:Villages in Johor
title: Air Papan
